about_the_game:
Step into the pixelated realm of nostalgia with the AR3NA: Gameboy Classic Edition DLC! This remastered version takes you back to the roots of the original AR3NA, featuring 100 challenging levels that will test your precision and gaming prowess.

Key Features:

100 Challenging Levels:
Dive into the classic gameplay that made AR3NA a fan favorite. Navigate through 100 handcrafted levels, each progressively more challenging, as you aim to clear the digital jungle of mischievous monkeys.
Retro Remake Aesthetics:
Experience the charm of retro gaming with pixel-perfect graphics that pay homage to the golden era of video games. The Classic Edition DLC stays true to the original while providing a visually appealing and nostalgic atmosphere.
Singular Monkey Type:
Face off against a single type of monkey, each with its own unique behavior. Adapt your strategies as you encounter different scenarios, relying on your marksmanship to overcome the evolving challenges.
Enhanced Gameplay Mechanics:
Hone your skills in precision shooting as you navigate through intricate levels. The absence of power-ups puts your abilities to the test, requiring a strategic approach to clear each stage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
